section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr Bin Shu'aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The blood money for Ahl Adh-Dhimmah is half that of the blood money for the Muslims, and they are the Jews and Christians
